options.B: Report as-built deviations with tolerances and recommend remediation if required

correct_answer: Report as-built deviations with tolerances and recommend remediation if required

question: NAVD88-equivalent vertical datum requested, but local benchmark is on legacy arbitrary datum.

options.A: Apply +1.0 m as rule of thumb
options.B: Assume the local datum equals requested
options.C: Transfer heights from leveled connection to official datum and document transformation

correct_answer: Transfer heights from leveled connection to official datum and document transformation

question: Client wants parcel split into three even areas but the shape is highly irregular.

options.D: Propose geometry that balances area while keeping access/servitudes compliant

correct_answer: Propose geometry that balances area while keeping access/servitudes compliant

question: A mining lease boundary overlaps a community buffer established by statute.

options.A: Map both layers, state hierarchy of controls, and advise statutory compliance
options.D: Show only the lease to avoid delays

correct_answer: Map both layers, state hierarchy of controls, and advise statutory compliance

question: Old traverse notes are in grads; your team processed in degrees.

options.B: Convert units consistently and reprocess; update all bearings

correct_answer: Convert units consistently and reprocess; update all bearings

question: Client requests your raw GNSS RINEX for independent QA.

options.C: Provide RINEX, antenna heights, logs, and processing summary

correct_answer: Provide RINEX, antenna heights, logs, and processing summary

question: A river cross-section survey needs consistent stationing every 10 m, but boat drifted.

options.B: Interpolate every 10 m from first three shots
options.D: Resection/line-up with bank control and reshoot missed sections

correct_answer: Resection/line-up with bank control and reshoot missed sections

question: Parcel lies within an area affected by magnetite causing compass disturbance.

options.A: Avoid magnetic bearings; use astronomic/grid bearings with control

correct_answer: Avoid magnetic bearings; use astronomic/grid bearings with control

question: You detect network RTK base broadcasting wrong antenna height.

options.B: Cease use; notify provider; recompute with correct height

correct_answer: Cease use; notify provider; recompute with correct height

question: Client insists title plan scale be 1:800 when regulations require 1:500.

options.C: Use the prescribed scale and cite regulation on plan

correct_answer: Use the prescribed scale and cite regulation on plan

question: Densification requires adding two control points in a constrained urban core.

options.B: Use one quick GPS shot each
options.D: Use short baselines, forced-centering, and double-run observations

correct_answer: Use short baselines, forced-centering, and double-run observations

question: A contractor asks you to ‘shift’ setting-out pegs to fit formwork.

options.A: Refuse; restake correctly and report deviation

correct_answer: Refuse; restake correctly and report deviation

question: Aerial triangulation bundle adjustment residuals are above tolerance.

options.A: Accept residuals since map looks okay
options.B: Add/check GCPs and tie points; rerun bundle; document RMSE

correct_answer: Add/check GCPs and tie points; rerun bundle; document RMSE

question: Topographic survey around high-voltage lines shows EDM noise.

options.C: Use reflectorless with safe offsets and multiple checks

correct_answer: Use reflectorless with safe offsets and multiple checks

question: Stakeout for a retaining wall reveals unexpected subsidence.

options.D: Pause works; request geotechnical assessment and adjust design control

correct_answer: Pause works; request geotechnical assessment and adjust design control

question: Landowner wants beacon numbers renumbered to match family preference.

options.A: Maintain original numbering per lodged record and add note if re-sequenced

correct_answer: Maintain original numbering per lodged record and add note if re-sequenced

question: Client wants a quick hydrographic check using a fishing echo sounder.

options.A: Use fishing sounder but add disclaimer
options.B: Decline; use calibrated survey echo sounder with bar-check

correct_answer: Decline; use calibrated survey echo sounder with bar-check

question: Mixed deeds reference bearings to ‘true north’ but drawings show ‘grid north’.

options.C: State both references; compute convergence; keep bearings consistent

correct_answer: State both references; compute convergence; keep bearings consistent

question: Community boundary runs along a ridge crest; fog reduces visibility during traverse.

options.D: Establish intervisible temporary targets or postpone; ensure closure

correct_answer: Establish intervisible temporary targets or postpone; ensure closure

question: As-built survey detects a culvert invert level 0.12 m higher than design.

options.A: Report nonconformance with tolerance check and recommend rectification

correct_answer: Report nonconformance with tolerance check and recommend rectification

question: Your client’s deed area is larger than GIS parcel by 2.3%.

options.B: Compute deed vs ground; reconcile with control and advise rectification process

correct_answer: Compute deed vs ground; reconcile with control and advise rectification process
